abstract: Comcast Corp. and Big Ten Network said on Thursday they had signed a long-term agreement.
snippet: Comcast Corp. and Big Ten Network said on Thursday they had signed a long-term agreement.
lead_paragraph: “Comcast Corp. and Big Ten Network said on Thursday they have signed a long-term agreement for the leading U.S. cable operator to carry Big Ten’s college sports programming across television, broadband and video-on-demand starting August 15,” Reuters reports.

headline.main: Comcast, Big Ten Network Reach Carriage Pact
